channel.title: How can i Add a Co-Owner Rank?
channel.description: Im using Zenith 667 source and i was wondering how to add the rights and ::yell name for a Co owner... the rights atm.. at 0 - Player, 1- Mod and 2 Admin and 7 - owner. Can someone walk me through on how to add this?

item.title: How can i Add a Co-Owner Rank?
item.dc:creator: @xplode xplode
item.description:
@xplode wrote:

just copy the owners rights… change the rights number to 6… and then owner to co owner… probably just simple as that

Read full topic
item.source: How can i Add a Co-Owner Rank?
